translations: 亚组；副族；子单元；元素，亚单元

sentences.sentence: Cyclic AMP binds to the regulatory subunit of protein kinase A: Protein kinase A phosphorylates phosphorylase kinase.
sentences.translation: 环腺苷酸结合蛋白激酶的调节亚基：一个磷酸化蛋白激酶磷酸化酶激酶。

sentences.sentence: Select one of the desired choices for the subunit conversion.
sentences.translation: 为子单元转化选择一个合适的选项。

sentences.sentence: Right click on the subunit list table, this will open up a Convert subunits popup menu as shown in Figure 6 below.
sentences.translation: 右击子单元列表，就会打开一个如图6所示的转移子单元弹出菜单。
